activities:
WePow is a virtual video interview service that helps recruiters and hiring managers to evaluate candidates more efficiently. Candidates respond to a series of questions using their webcams over an Internet connection and reviewers evaluate and provide feedback on these candidates.
WePow may store the following personal data (not an exhaustive list):
-Candidate name and email address
-Candidate responses (video)
-Candidates’ feedback about the process
-Candidates’ resumes
-Reviewers’ comments and evaluations on candidates
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: EU Data Protection Authorities (DPAs) and the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC)
